targets.rawSql: SELECT status, date_time FROM smart_home.alarm
SELECT motion_status, date_time FROM smart_home.motion_sensor
SELECT sensor_average, date_time FROM smart_home.temperature_sensor
SELECT sensor_average, date_time FROM smart_home.temperature_sensor

SELECT
  date_time AS "time",
  temperature
FROM temperature_sensor
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(date_time) AND
  name = 'TH1'
ORDER BY date_time

SELECT
  date_time AS "time",
  temperature
FROM temperature_sensor
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(date_time) AND
  name = "TH2"
ORDER BY date_time
SELECT temperature_diff, date_time FROM smart_home.temperature_sensor

SELECT
  date_time AS "time",
  total_energy
FROM total_energy_sensor
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(date_time)
ORDER BY date_time

SELECT
  date_time AS "time",
  sensor_max
FROM total_energy_sensor
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(date_time)
ORDER BY date_time
SELECT total_consumption, date_time FROM smart_home.total_water_consumption_sensor
SELECT sensor_max, date_time FROM smart_home.total_water_consumption_sensor
SELECT sensor_sum, date_time FROM smart_home.electric_device_energy_sensor
SELECT energy, date_time, name FROM smart_home.electric_device_energy_sensor WHERE name='MiAC1'
SELECT energy, date_time, name FROM smart_home.electric_device_energy_sensor WHERE name='MiAC2'

SELECT
  date_time AS "time",
  sensor_sum
FROM air_condition_energy_sensor
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(date_time)
ORDER BY date_time
SELECT energy, date_time FROM smart_home.air_condition_energy_sensor WHERE name='HVAC1'
SELECT energy, date_time FROM smart_home.air_condition_energy_sensor WHERE name='HVAC2'
SELECT sensor_sum, date_time FROM smart_home.water_consumption_sensor
SELECT consumption, date_time FROM smart_home.water_consumption_sensor WHERE name='W1'
SELECT consumption, date_time FROM smart_home.water_consumption_sensor WHERE name='W2'

panels.title: 🚿 Water Consumption Sensor W2 (to be installed), 15'

targets.rawSql: SELECT sensor_name, device_status, measurement, event_id, description, date_time FROM smart_home.late_rejected_event LIMIT 50

SELECT
  date_time AS "time",
  id
FROM air_condition_energy_sensor
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(date_time)
ORDER BY date_time

panels.title: Future Work: Multiple Smart House Monitoring
